properties.entry: SELECT COMPLAIN_COMMENT_NO, COMPLAIN_COMMENT_CONTENT, COMPLAIN_COMMENT_DT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, COMPLAIN_COMMENT_MODIFY, COMPLAIN_COMMENT_STATUS, COMPLAIN_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GRADE FROM COMPLAIN_COMMENT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE COMPLAIN_COMMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND COMPLAIN_NO = ? ORDER BY COMPLAIN_COMMENT_NO DESC
INSERT INTO COMPLAIN_COMMENT VALUES(SEQ_CCNO.NEXTVAL, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ?, ?)
UPDATE COMPLAIN_COMMENT SET COMPLAIN_COMMENT_CONTENT = ?, COMPLAIN_COMMENT_DT = DEFAULT WHERE COMPLAIN_COMMENT_NO = ?
UPDATE COMPLAIN_COMMENT SET COMPLAIN_COMMENT_STATUS = 'N' WHERE COMPLAIN_COMMENT_NO = ?
